resources.string: We are going to fix contacts, so we need contact permissions, right?
This app is designed to let the operating system sort contacts in the right order, by updating phonetic names and types of your contacts.

How this works:

\Update for Chinese contacts: Phonetic name is Pinyin, which will be translated from the contact name. Phonetic type is PINYIN. So that system will use phonetic last name to determine the order.


Update for Latin contacts: Phonetic name and type will be removed. So that system will use contact first name to determine the order.

\Remove all phonetic data: For Android 7.0 above, the system seems can handle Chinese name correctly. You may want to try to clear phonetic data. However, the benefit of using phonetic data is that they can be synced across devices and benefit all of them.
Transliterator data is missing, can not process

Enable background listening on contacts changes. Also choose whether update phonetic data automatically in the background, or just notify you with a notification. Notice that it won\'t consume battery unless contacts data really changed.
This is the preview of phonetic names that need to be updated. Please select all contacts you want to update.
